籤詩版本二:
N'chifukwa chiyani muyenera kuyang'ana jade kuchokera kunja?
Ndi bwino kuyembekezera nzeru za munthu wanzeru ndi kukhala omasuka.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi imabisala chithunzi chopezeka mu jade.
Chilichonse chikhoza kuchitika panthawi yake.
解曰: Muli golide ndi yade. Sindikudziwa choti ndiyang'ane. Pezani malangizo anu. Palibe chifukwa chodandaula.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kuluma golide ndikulemba ganyu zabwino
Cheng Yaojin anali tate woyamba wa Mzera wa Tang. Tsiku lina, Rengui anali kugona m’mapiri ndipo mwadzidzidzi anapeza Yaojin akuthamangitsidwa ndi nyalugwe pamene ankadutsa chapafupi. .
Yaojin anachita chidwi ndi masewera a karati a Rengui, ndipo anam’patsa muvi wa Jinling, n’kumupempha kuti alowe usilikali.
Xue Rengui pambuyo pake adakhala wamkulu wa Tang Dynasty.
聖意: Pempherani nyumba yanu ndi chitetezo chanu, pemphererani chuma chanu, ndipo dikirani kuti ukwati wanu uchedwe. , zantchito, ndi milandu ya anthu.Kusamuka kuli kosangalatsa komanso kotayika.Matenda akumpoto amakumana ndi madokotala abwino.Manda akumapiri akuyenera kusinthidwa.
